title: opensuse 11.0 i386 dvd iso image only (fix file for other torren
description:
regarding the earlier opensuse 11.0 goldmaster torrent at: <a href="
http://thepiratebay.se/tor/4237884" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://thepiratebay.se/tor/4237884</a>

the other torrent file created by azureus apparently got messed up exactly one chunk inside the opensuse 11.0 dvd iso image

openSUSE-11.0-DVD-i386.iso

you will need to pause that file from the other torrent (dont delete it if you have already downloaded chunks of that file inside the other torrent)


then add this torrent and point it to your already downloaded openSUSE-11.0-DVD-i386.iso file

it will check the available pieces/bytes you already might have of it and simply finish the last missing chunk.

you will have the proper correct md5 and sha1sum afterwards. you can check.

the other torrent will always fail to check that torrent completely and will always say one missing chunk left, as the .torrent file apparently got corrupted during chunk hashing.

this is most weird. maybe we shall contact them azureus developers.




so download all the bits you can get from http://thepiratebay.se/tor/4237884

and add this torrent as soon as the file has one chunk left (which will never finish with the other torrent properly as explained).

this .torrent will finish the dvd iso image file all right.

happy torrenting.
